name: Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles
description:
Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles is an action game developed by Racjin. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Europe. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles on PlayStation 2.
Takuya Iwasaki produced the game. It was directed by Isao Mutou and Takeshi Murata. Kenji Tani scored the game.
